title: Koning van de Wereld
overview: At the end of World War II, young Stan Vandewalle meets boxing trainer Max in a prison camp. Max recognizes Stan's strong left fist as a great boxing talent and becomes his trainer. After the war, Stan lives with his head in the clouds. Until disaster strikes and his gifted younger brother Alo√Øs dies. As a tribute to his brother who died in an accident, Stan vows to become the greatest boxer in the world.
